channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Zoho ManageEngine Multiple Products

item.title: CVE-2023-2291|2023-04-26T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- zoho%20manageengine%20multiple%20products
item.description: Static credentials exist in the PostgreSQL data used in ManageEngine Access Manager Plus (AMP) build 4309, ManageEngine Password Manager Pro, and ManageEngine PAM360. These credentials could allow a malicious actor to modify configuration data that would escalate their permissions from that of a low-privileged user to an Administrative user.
